What's the difference between taxi and private hire?

Understanding the difference is important - different rules and licences apply.

Feature Hackney Carriage (Taxi) Private Hire
Street hailing ‚úì Can be hailed in street ‚úó Pre-booking only
Taxi ranks ‚úì Can wait at designated ranks ‚úó Cannot use ranks
Booking method Hailing, ranks, or pre-booking Must be pre-booked through operator
Fares Maximum set by council (tariff) Agreed with operator/customer

Critical difference: Private hire vehicles accepting street hailing are operating illegally - the journey is uninsured and the driver is committing a criminal offence.
